question: Have you reached the age of 18??

Are you a holder of a university, technical institute, vocational training institute degree or a graduate of Vocational Education or a post-secondary year of Apprenticeship in a relevant specialty or a graduate of compulsory education?
Do you have a good state of mental and physical health, proven by a certificate/opinion from a Psychiatrist, Internist or General Practitioner within the last three months?
options: Yes, I am in good physical and mental health according to a doctor's certificate within the last few months.

question: Do you suffer from a contagious skin disease, proven by a certificate/opinion from a Dermatologist within the last three months?
options: No, I do not suffer from a contagious skin disease, which is proven by a relevant certificate from a Dermatologist within the last three months.

question: Are you under judicial protection, have you been deprived of parental responsibility or have you lost the right to exercise it, if you are a parent, is there a lawsuit or appeal pending against you before a competent authority, are you being prosecuted or have you been convicted of any felony, for offenses that entail, according to article 1537 of the Civil Code, deprivation of parental responsibility or for offenses against physical integrity, against personal freedom, against sexual freedom, as well as for offenses related to drugs or organ trafficking?
options: No, I have not committed, been prosecuted or convicted of any offense or felony listed.
Yes, I have committed, been prosecuted or convicted of at least one offense or felony listed.

question: What type of residence permit do you have with access to the labor market?
options: Details of a uniform residence permit for beneficiaries of international protection.

Details of the Special Identity Card of an Expatriate that apply to: a) Expatriates with Albanian citizenship and their children b) Foreign spouses of expatriates, regardless of citizenship, as well as their foreign minor children from a previous marriage, of whom they have parental care c) Widowed foreign spouses of expatriates.
Residence certificate details for citizens of a European Union (EU) Member State with the right to free movement.
Registration certificate details for citizens of a European Union (EU) Member State with the right of free movement.
Request to submit a residence permit renewal in case of expiration of the existing residence permit - For citizens of a third country outside Schengen.
